def barh(ser):
    ax=ser.plot.barh(width=0.9,figsize=(12,10),
                     color=sns.color_palette('inferno_r',len(ser)))
    for i, v in enumerate(ser): 
        ax.text(.8, i, v,fontsize=10,color='green',weight='bold')
    # make top bar red
    ax.patches[i].set_facecolor('r')  
    return ax
